meanings.definition: Not appropriated or assigned to a particular person or purpose.
meanings.sent1: The unappropriated land was available for anyone to use.
meanings.sent2: The unappropriated funds were left untouched in the account.
meanings.sent3: The unappropriated classroom chairs decided to have a party when no one was looking.
meanings.sent4: Her unappropriated creativity flowed freely like a wild river.
meanings.sent5: The unappropriated opportunities in life are like hidden treasures waiting to be discovered.

meanings.definition: Not taken for one's own use or possession.
meanings.sent1: The unappropriated snacks were left untouched on the table.
meanings.sent2: He always made sure to leave unappropriated items for others to enjoy.
meanings.sent3: The unappropriated umbrella decided to take a walk on its own.
meanings.sent4: Her unappropriated time felt like a gift from the universe.
meanings.sent5: The unappropriated books on the shelf seemed to call out for attention.
